message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $12,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a good value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short of my target. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
